微型光学传感器为糖尿病患者提供无痛血糖监测几十年来，糖尿病患者一直依靠刺破手指来抽血或使用粘性微针来测量和管理血糖水平。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240319/Miniaturized-optical-sensor-offers-pain-free-glucose-monitoring-for-diabetics.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240319/Miniaturized-optical-sensor-offers-pain-free-glucose-monitoring-for-diabetics.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=730dd14b-0c98-4c34-bf87-7b48244324d7 Tue, 19 Mar 2024 07:50:55 -0400 Miniaturized optical sensor offers pain-free glucose monitoring for diabetics

国家政治野心如何推动或失败各州保护堕胎权的举措2月初，堕胎权支持者聚集在一起，在选美大赛上改变密苏里州的历史——这是一个传奇的俱乐部，摇滚革命者查克·贝里经常在这里演出：他们发起了一场签名收集活动，旨在今年向选民提出一项宪法修正案，使堕胎权合法化。该州堕胎。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240319/How-national-political-ambition-could-fuel-or-fail-initiatives-to-protect-abortion-rights-in-states.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240319/How-national-political-ambition-could-fuel-or-fail-initiatives-to-protect-abortion-rights-in-states.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=c093ee1b-9c9b-493b-90ca-3cde4d244998 Tue, 19 Mar 2024 06:51:44 -0400 How national political ambition could fuel, or fail, initiatives to protect abortion rights in states
疾病预防控制中心重新审视空气传播，卫生工作者担心利润重于保护四年前，纽约市的医院挤满了 covid-19 患者，急诊科医生索尼娅·斯托克斯 (Sonya Stokes) 仍然对美国卫生系统的准备不足和误导感到震惊。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240319/Health-workers-fear-ite28099s-profits-before-protection-as-CDC-revisits-airborne-transmission.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240319/Health-workers-fear-ite28099s-profits-before-protection-as-CDC-revisits-airborne-transmission.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=d85d128b-0b81-493c-98a8-54237c9e6cde Tue, 19 Mar 2024 06:40:03 -0400 Health workers fear it’s profits before protection as CDC revisits airborne transmission

轻度新冠肺炎的基因关键：某些基因可降低老年男性的严重程度和死亡风险研究发现，IL1RN 基因中的某些遗传变异可显着降低患者与 COVID-19 相关的炎症和死亡率，在携带特定单核苷酸变异的老年男性中观察到显着改善。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240319/Genetic-key-to-milder-COVID-Certain-genes-slash-severity-and-death-risk-in-older-men.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240319/Genetic-key-to-milder-COVID-Certain-genes-slash-severity-and-death-risk-in-older-men.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=654b89bc-12a6-4026-ba58-6a4f878039a3 Tue, 19 Mar 2024 00:01:00 -0400 Genetic key to milder COVID: Certain genes slash severity and death risk in older men
